#summary Cite This WordPress Plugin
#labels P-CT
Nowadays, more and more bloggers write informative articles. By this plugin, those articles could be referred to in a formal citation.

= Features =
  * Fully customized citation styles.
  * Three modes to provide citation texts.
    # Append after article.
    # A link to a static page or loading dynamically.
    # Open in new window.
  * Different modes in single post or multi-post loop.
  * Widget support
  * Plugin options page.

= Demonstration =

Please check this [http://www.livibetter.com/blog/2007/07/19/wp-plugin-cite-this-demo-post/ demo blog post] out.

= Download =

Please download this plugin source in [http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/cite-this/ WordPress Extend], files are not provided in this Google Code page.
